item.title: Hugo Learning Resource
item.description: If you are learning Hugo and ‘blogdown’, the giraffeacademy set of videos should be of great help, check it out: http://www.giraffeacademy.com/ http://www.giraffeacademy.com/static-site-generators/hugo/
